subject: Hockey, Ice
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Though the N.H.L. is expected to send players to the Olympics in Sochi, Russia, next year, the league is still trying to get extra concessions from Olympic officials.
snippet: Though the N.H.L. is expected to send players to the Olympics in Sochi, Russia, next year, the league is still trying to get extra concessions from Olympic officials.
